Articles.Content:
This is my attempt at make a MiG-25, I'm not 100% happy with it. The I don't like the how the air-intakes rise above the fuselage, but nothing can be perfect.

Mods:

FAR

B9 Aerospace

Romfarer Lazor System and Weapons

Aviation Lights

Coffee Industries Modular Planes

Sceppies Minipack

TT Modular Wheels( Only two parts: TTDualWheelPod_ and TTDualWheelPod_ms)

Real Life MiG-25:

29'000 Kg

Mach 2.8 (3.2 in test flights)

1,197Km Range

KSP MiG-25:

20'100Kg

3.5+(Wings fly off) 2.3 (safe speed)

On paper it can go around Kerbin

Since FAR added aerodynamic stress its been a pain in my Left cheek, You won't be able to do 7+ G turns because wing fly off (no matter how many struts).

If you have a joystick or a controller use it, you can use a keyboard just have SAS and DCA (FAR) on.

If you can give me some tips on making it better please feel free to leave a comment.

Craft File:

http://www./view/7yd2xy2vrtmvmdl/Mikoyan-Gurevich_MiG-25.craft

^^^WITHOUT ROMFARER MODS^^^
This is awesome. I love how people are starting to get really good at creating smooth, accurate fuselages. If you wanted eyeballs you could resize those intakes to make them perfect

This is awesome. I love how people are starting to get really good at creating smooth, accurate fuselages. If you wanted eyeballs you could resize those intakes to make them perfect

Thanks for the idea Ill try and resize them tonight.

Dude your stuff is awesome, it looks like the Su-35 that bludclot made, I actually had to check and make sure a different person made this, here is his forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76739-Sukhoi-SU-35-replica-B9-procedural-wings-coffee-industries-FAR-DE

Dude your stuff is awesome, it looks like the Su-35 that bludclot made, I actually had to check and make sure a different person made this, here is hisforum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76739-Sukhoi-SU-35-replica-B9-procedural-wings-coffee-industries-FAR-DE

Thanks man, Yeah my MiG does have it's similarities to his Flanker, I did however get the idea from him to do the screenshots outside the SPH.

Edited May 9, 2014 by -KidWithEyeBalls-
